This ZAFUL Men's Color Block Sweater is both visually striking and comfortable, offering a unique abstract flame design that is sure to stand out. Made from a soft knit material, it provides a cozy feel without being too heavy, making it an excellent choice for layering in cooler weather. While not a thick outer layer, it offers some warmth and breathability, ideal for adding style to your outfit without overheating.  The sweater fits well according to the size guide, making it comfortable for everyday wear. Its loose fit gives it a relaxed, casual look, perfect for pairing with jeans or casual pants. Overall, this is a well-made sweater that delivers good value for its quality, combining comfort, style, and versatility. :)

This sweater is so warm for how thin, breathable, soft and stretchy it is. I’m an XS (5’4, 115lbs, 24” waist, 32” bust) but I ordered Large because I don’t like my sweaters even remotely fitted—I feel stuffy very easily. I love the fit. It’s on the wider fit side rather than long and straight (I much prefer this). It’s loose knit, but still has a substantial weight to it. Would be a little iffy as the only layer on cold and windy days, but very warm if no wind.
I got this for my teenage son and he loves it. It’s very vibrant and is indeed oversized. It’s very soft and comfortable to wear.  It washes well and is a really good quality sweater.

This sweater is scary comfortable and will not disappoint you. I wore it out of the box throughout my day with no weird smells, itchiness, damage, or anything. The only real issue you may have is with the design, but I am sure they have a quality sweater anyone could enjoy.

I'm usually a medium but ordered a large and the large fit great.  The material is really soft and comfortable. The quality feels really good as well.  One thing to note is that there isn't a tag on this sweater so it's hard to tell which is the front and the back but it does feel like there is a front and a back. It might take some trial and error to find which side fits best but other than that no complaints.

Definitely an eye catching unique design that is an abstract style. Sweater is very soft and fits good using the size guide. Decent weight to it but isn't heavy which is expected for some heft considering its size. Great that it provides some extra warmth as an additional layer, it is more breathable though so wouldn't use it as the only outer layer during colder time more for aesthetics.

This oversized sweater is so, so cute in every way. The green design on it is wonderful. It has a color and design that brightens my mood during the winter days when we see less sunlight. Despite being oversized, it’s not bulky, heavy, or uncomfortable at all. I love that the sleeves are cuffed because the sweater doesn’t slide down from my wrists, and the white cuffs are a great touch, making it look very nice. It seems like a sweater that will keep me warm enough.

The ZAFUL Men's Casual Long-Sleeve Soft Loose Graphic Knitted Jumper Pullover is an excellent addition to any wardrobe! The material is incredibly soft and cozy, making it perfect for cooler days. I was pleasantly surprised by how lightweight yet warm it is—ideal for layering or wearing on its own. The loose, casual fit gives it a relaxed vibe without looking sloppy, and the graphic design adds a stylish touch that sets it apart from basic sweaters. The crewneck cut is timeless and pairs easily with jeans or joggers for a laid-back, everyday look. Despite multiple washes, the sweater has held up beautifully with no fading, shrinking, or pilling, which is always a plus. This pullover is versatile, comfortable, and fashionable, making it a great go-to for any casual occasion. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a well-made, stylish, and comfortable sweater! Five stars!
very warm  great
Great fit and very comfortable. True to size.

It's much nicer than I expected.  I ordered a 2X because I wanted it extra roomy.  I usually wear an XL, the 2X is a comfortable fit, so I'd say it runs a tad small.  I thought the "flame" would be more of a muted tone but it's bold and fun.  The fabric is attractive and soft.  Highly recommend.

评论概述: very soft and warm sweater, a smidge smaller than expected
评论详情: Really nice soft material this sweater is made from. it is not itchy at all. I love the unusual design , a little more rock n roll if that makes sense. The colors are nice and rich as well. very well made, stitches are well put together, not loose stitches, nice and tight and warm. The sizing is a little bit smaller than expected and then i would expect it to shrink a bit in the wash. Otherwise I love everything about this sweater. would go well with a nice pair of jeans and would keep you nice and warm in the colder months. Quality is nice and the price is reasonable

This is my first sweater I’ve bought. I wanted something with flair and comfort. When it comes down to it. It hit all the marks, it’s warm. It’s loose, and overall has a nice look. For this price it’s definitely worth it, especially considering the current time of year

Love the design of this sweater and knew I had to get it to wear this winter.  I was hoping for a more "cotton-like" feel to the material, but it's definitely an acrylic blend.  This doesn't detract from the quality and the looks of the sweater, however.  It still has a very soft feel, with a little bit of stretch to it, and it looks great for wintertime streetwear layered over a tee.

I got this for my husband who needed a nice, warm sweater for our winter vacation. He loved this item. It was comfortable, fitted well and good for cold weather—it’s warm. The design is fun. The stitching is good and sewn well.

Comfortable softness encompasses the body, despite being oversized in style it doesn't look baggy or trashy but aesthetically appealing. Material is viscose meaning it's breathable in nature so don't expect this to be a powerhouse for warmth which makes this great for weathers all around.

This sweater isn’t oversize it’s just true to size. I ordered a M and it looks and fits like a medium. If you want it to be oversized, you should size up. But besides the sizing, this sweater is perfect! The material feels very well made and soft and the patter looks great on the sweater.

I ordered the XXL for my husband and fits like his boreal size, xl...so it runs a teeny bit small. It's very soft and comfortable.  Recommended.

excellent

This sweater is well made and comfortable. The stitching is perfectly weaved and has no flaws. The only “knock” is it doesn’t have a tag on the collar line, so one may confuse what is the front or back. Other than that, it’s a surprisingly good fit and product.

This is the softest sweater I have ever worn. It is not itchy at all in the inside which is what I was most worried about. The stitching is a bit on the lower quality side, so be careful washing it with hot or warm water for an excessive amount of time. The sweater is breathable so wind easily passes through it. It is a bit baggy for my style, but It was definitely worth purchasing.
